author: ETA PRIME
description:
In this video, we take our first look at the all-new ASUS ROG Xbox Ally X, the next generation of handheld Windows gaming.We unbox it, go over the design, build quality, and ergonomics, then dive deep into the specs and new software features — all powered by the AMD Ryzen Z2 Extreme APU.
We benchmark the Ally X using 3DMark Time Spy and Geekbench 6, then jump into real gameplay with Forza Horizon 5, Cyberpunk 2077, Borderlands 4, and Street Fighter 6 for D-pad testing. We also check out indie gaming performance with Silksong and get a feel for battery life and thermals.
With improved cooling, a redesigned shell, and better power management, the ROG Xbox Ally X might just be the ultimate Windows handheld of 2025!

title: ROG Xbox Ally X Hands-On! Ryzen Z2 Extreme First Look 🔥
